Work
I walk into the home office and to the computer to switch it on. I sit in the chair and operate the computer with the keyboard and mouse.


[WALK] <home_office> (1.319)
[WALK] <computer> (1.417)
[SWITCHON] <computer> (1.417)
[FIND] <chair> (1.356)
[SIT] <chair> (1.356)
[FIND] <mouse> (1.413)
[GRAB] <mouse> (1.413)
[FIND] <keyboard> (1.415)
[TYPE] <keyboard> (1.415)
